Alan KorLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 23 Jul 2019Fund return is not the same as shareholder/policyholder returndo take note when pple with conflicting interest tries to entice you by using the fund returns0 comments0

Harvey TanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 22 Jul 2019If you are buying for yield, i guess thats fine since the distribution yield is considered 'high' relatively speaking of couse.
But note that the source of the yield is mostly coming from the non-investment grade bond alloction of the portfolio which pretty much explained why the distribution yield is relatively highif you are looking for growth, look elsewhere.0 comments0
